mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QES_SPACE ( SPACE_ID, OWNER_USER_ID, NAME, OPENED_TIME, END_TIME ) VALUES ( #{entity.spaceId, jdbcType=OTHER}, #{entity.ownerId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.openedTime}, #{entity.closeTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.SPACE_ID, s.OWNER_USER_ID, s.NAME, S.OPENED_TIME, S.END_TIME FROM QES_SPACE S WHERE S.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} AND S.END_TIME > #{currentTime}
